summary: The story of the real-life family pop group consisting of six kids and their mother that inspired TV's "Partridge Family".
cast: Bill Cowsill|Bob Cowsill|Richard Cowsill|Paul Cowsill|Barry Cowsill|John Cowsill|Susan Cowsill|Waddy Wachtel|'Cousin Brucie' Morrow|Brooks Arthur|Zach Glickman|Tommy James|Richard 'Biggie' Korn|Artie Kornfeld|David Ray|Shirley Jones|Jean Russell|Flo Presley|Eleanor Worley|Bobby Brooks|Ryan Cowsill|Brendon Cowsill|Russ Broussard|Johnny Carson|Barbara Cowsill|Bud Cowsill|Tiffany Cowsill|Mike Douglas|Buddy Ebsen|Ralph Boyd Johnson|Tim Scheu|Ed Sullivan
title: Family Band: The Cowsills Story
